statements: SELECT * FROM patient_monitoring_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM patient_monitoring_devices WHERE battery_level > 50;
SELECT patient_id, device_name, manufacturer FROM patient_monitoring_devices WHERE last_checkin < '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_type, manufacturer FROM patient_monitoring_devices WHERE battery_level < 20 ORDER BY last_checkin DESC;
SELECT patient_id, device_name FROM patient_monitoring_devices WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp' AND battery_level >= 30;
SELECT device_id, device_name, manufacturer FROM patient_monitoring_devices WHERE battery_level > 50 ORDER BY last_checkin DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_monitoring_devices WHERE device_type = 'ECG' AND battery_level < 20
SELECT device_name, battery_level FROM patient_monitoring_devices WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp'
SELECT device_id, patient_id, device_type FROM patient_monitoring_devices ORDER BY device_id
SELECT * FROM patient_monitoring_devices WHERE last_checkin > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM vital_signs ORDER BY reading_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM monitoring_devices;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, address FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND body_temperature > 98.6;
SELECT patient_name, body_temperature FROM patients JOIN vital_signs ON patients.patient_id = vital_signs.patient_id WHERE body_temperature < 97.5;
SELECT device_name, location FROM monitoring_devices WHERE device_type = 'EKG';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 40
SELECT name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT device_type, last_sync FROM monitoring_devices WHERE last_sync > '2022-01-01'
SELECT name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT reading_id, heart_rate, temperature FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 80
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';

SELECT patients.name, vital_signs.heart_rate, monitoring_devices.device_type FROM patients JOIN monitoring_devices ON patients.patient_id = monitoring_devices.patient_id JOIN vital_signs ON monitoring_devices.device_id = vital_signs.device_id;
SELECT AVG(heart_rate), MAX(temperature) FROM vital_signs WHERE device_id = '12345';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_status = 'active';
SELECT reading_id, heart_rate, temperature FROM vital_signs WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_id ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_status FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'monitor'
SELECT patient_name, age, contact_number FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical'
SELECT patient_name, age, contact_number FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_status = 'Active';
SELECT patient_name, heart_rate, temperature FROM patients JOIN vital_signs ON patients.patient_id = vital_signs.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM devices WHERE device_status = 'Active';
SELECT patient_name, temperature FROM patients JOIN vital_signs ON patients.patient_id = vital_signs.patient_id WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT patient_name, alert_type FROM patients JOIN alerts USING (patient_id) WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
